task.title: Keeping to-do lists
task.shortdesc: Keep track of your chores and errands, of reading lists, of travel arrangements, etc. on To Do boards.

li.p: Set the list to Private, if you want to work on it alone and hide it even from your groups.
Add board members (family, friends, students or colleagues), assign them tasks and collaborate on an Organization list.
Let the community participate, by keeping a Public list.
